description:
DocumentUltimate is an ASP.NET Document Viewer and Converter which supports both ASP.NET MVC and
        ASP.NET WebForms web applications/web sites. DocumentUltimate can also be used with
        .NET desktop applications for conversion between several document formats.

Can view or convert from these document file formats:

- Digital Paper Formats:

   - Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF): .pdf

   - Microsoft XML Paper Specification (XPS): .xps

   - Microsoft Open XML Paper Specification (OpenXPS): .oxps

   - Electronic Publication (EPUB): .epub

   - DocumentUltimate Web Viewer Format (XPZ): .xpz

- Microsoft Word Formats:

   - Microsoft Word Document: .docx

   - Microsoft Word Macro-Enabled Document: .docm

   - Microsoft Word Template: .dotx

   - Microsoft Word Macro-Enabled Template: .dotm

   - Microsoft Word 97-2003 Document: .doc

   - Microsoft Word 97-2003 Template: .dot

   - Rich Text Document: .rtf

- Microsoft Excel Formats:

   - Microsoft Excel Worksheet: .xlsx

   - Microsoft Excel Macro-Enabled Worksheet: .xlsm

   - Microsoft Excel Binary Worksheet: .xlsb

   - Microsoft Excel 97-2003 Worksheet: .xls

   - Microsoft Excel Comma Separated Values File: .csv

- Microsoft PowerPoint Formats:

   - Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation: .pptx

   - Microsoft PowerPoint Slide Show: .ppsx

   - Microsoft PowerPoint 97-2003 Presentation: .ppt

   - Microsoft PowerPoint 97-2003 Slide Show: .pps

- Microsoft Visio Formats:

   - Microsoft Visio Drawing: .vsdx

   - Microsoft Visio 2003-2010 Drawing: .vdx

   - Microsoft Visio 2010 Web Drawing: .vdw

   - Microsoft Visio 2003-2010 Stencil: .vsx

   - Microsoft Visio 2003-2010 Template: .vtx

   - Microsoft Visio 2003-2010 Drawing: .vsd

   - Microsoft Visio 2003-2010 Stencil: .vss

   - Microsoft Visio 2003-2010 Template: .vst

- Microsoft Project Formats:

   - Microsoft Project Document: .mpp

   - Microsoft Project Template: .mpt

- Microsoft Outlook Formats:

   - Microsoft Outlook E-mail Message: .eml

   - Microsoft Outlook Item: .msg

   - Apple Mail E-mail File: .emlx

- OpenDocument Formats:

   - OpenDocument Text: .odt

   - OpenDocument Text Template: .ott

   - OpenDocument Spreadsheet: .ods

   - OpenDocument Presentation: .odp

- Markup Formats:

   - HyperText Markup Language (HTML): .html, .htm

   - Mime HTML (MHTML): .mht, .mhtml

- Text Formats:

   - Plain Text Document: .txt

- AutoCAD Formats:

   - AutoCAD Drawing (R13 to 2016): .dwg

   - AutoCAD Drawing Interchange (R12 to 2016): .dxf

- Scanner Image Formats:

   - Tagged Image File Format (TIFF): .tif, .tiff

   - Deja Vu (DjVu): .djvu

- Vector Image Formats:

   - Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG): .svg

   - Windows Enhanced Metafile (EMF): .emf

- Raster Image Formats:

   - Adobe Photoshop Document (PSD): .psd

   - Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG): .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, .jfif

   - JPEG 2000 (JP2): .jp2, .jpf, .jpx, .j2k, .j2c, .jpc

   - Portable Network Graphics (PNG): .png

   - Graphics Interchange Format (GIF): .gif

   - Bitmap Picture (BMP): .bmp

   - Device Independent Bitmap (DIB): .dib

   - Windows Icon (ICO): .ico
releaseNotes:
## Version 2.2.1 - January 16, 2017

- **Fixed:** Still in some cases, "Could not load file or assembly" errors (yellow screen of death) when the web app first starts

- **Fixed:** Conversion from PDF to Office formats was broken and this error was thrown: 
  "Object reference not set to an instance of an object."

## Version 2.2.0 - January 11, 2017

- **Fixed:** DocumenentConverterResult.OutputFiles sometimes did not match the actual file names when there were 
  multiple outputs (e.g. it was Document-002.svg and not Document-02.svg).

- **Added:** DocumentConverter samples to example projects for demonstrating possible conversions and listing all
  supported formats.

- **Added:** JPEG XR (HD Photo) (.jxr, .wdp, .hdp) format support.

- **Improved:** Enabled WMF format support again (EMF format was already supported).

- **Improved:** Disabled browser's right-click context menu for thumbnails in Document Viewer so that saving thumbnails is
  prevented.

- **Fixed:** When FIPS was enabled on the machine, you could see evaluation watermark in viewed or converted documents.

- **Improved:** Updated document conversion engines.
title: DocumentUltimate: ASP.NET Document Viewer and Converter
